Hi @ricaR done following updates

Updates made
  • ✅ I found an error on the sept/oct function pack - a weird black circle on floorplan page. I've now fixed this. We will need to update PDF (attached)
  • ✅ The embedded version automatically updates which is great!
  • ✅ We are missing the alternate drop menu in the NOV/DEC section. See reattached.
  • ✅ Please add beverage pack tab under each section. Then you can delete this whole section below as its not needed. OR RUN ONE LONG BLACK LINE UNDER BOTH BOXES SAYING BEVERAGE PACKS IF YOU THINK THAT LOOKS BETTER. SO AS BELOW BUT WITH TOP 3 LINES REMOVED AND JUST THE BEV PACK LINE.
  • ✅ SOME OF THE LINKED MENUS ARE INCORRECT. PLEASE REFER TO MY PREVIOUS EMAIL WITH ATTACHMENTS IE SEPT/OCT & NOV / DEC SHARE MENU IS INCORRECT

Url: https://www.lovefish.com.au/love-events-draft/

Time: +10mins

Hello Michelle,

I wanted to inform you that we have received your request, and our team is actively working on it.

You can expect to hear back from us with the updates by tomorrow.

Your patience is greatly appreciated.

Hi ! Ok looked through the new events page draft
  • I found an error on the sept/oct function pack - a weird black circle on floorplan page. I've now fixed this. We will need to update PDF (attached)
  • The embedded version automatically updates which is great!
  • We are missing the alternate drop menu in the NOV/DEC section. See reattached.
  • Please add beverage pack tab under each section. Then you can delete this whole section below as its not needed. OR RUN ONE LONG BLACK LINE UNDER BOTH BOXES SAYING BEVERAGE PACKS IF YOU THINK THAT LOOKS BETTER. SO AS BELOW BUT WITH TOP 3 LINES REMOVED AND JUST THE BEV PACK LINE.
SOME OF THE LINKED MENUS ARE INCORRECT. Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@jaime need your help with this ticket. I will send you the other files that customer shared with us via Slack if not email

Good morning,


Firstly can you please rename the drop down tab to SEPT WINE DOWN instead of winter wine down.
https://www.lovefish.com.au/winedown/




Then I need to make some function & event changes to the 'book an event' page


To complicate matters I need to add a xmas function pack AND keep the existing offering.


I am open to suggestions on how to format it but essentially I need the following -




SEPT + OCT FUNCTION PACK (WILL SEND SEPERATELY AS LARGE FILE)


SEPT + OCT SHARE MENU (ATTACHED)


SEPT + OCT SELECTION MENU (ATTACHED)


Then


NOV + DEC FUNCTION PACK (WILL SEND SEPERATELY AS LARGE FILE)


NOV + DEC SHARE MENU (ATTACHED)


NOV + DEC SELECTION MENU (ATTACHED)


NOV + DEC ALTERNATE DROP MENU (ATTACHED)


THE BEV PACK IS ALSO ATTCHED - BUT ONLY NEED THE ONE MENU TO COVER SEPT + OCT AND NOV + DEC.
